user_input:
Modify the DHEM model. 

• Get the datafile attribute for the Gas Pipeline Capacity data file for the PCIPMI infrastructure level (use crud pipeline)
• Create a variation of the Gas Pipeline Capacity data file for the PCIPMI infrastructure level by setting all values that aren't 0 to 999. Copy the H2\Gas.
• Create a new datafile object in the Datafile class using the Gas Pipeline category called something relating to PCIPMI capacities Unlimited. Add the filename property with the name of the datafile just created.
• Add a scenario called unlimited_pci_pmi_pipeline_capacities
• Add a max flow property to each object in the H2 inteconnection and H2 Internal bottleneck categories in the Gas Pipeline class, with the datafile and scenario created in the previous steps using the crud pipeline
• Clone the model "DHEM_v41_2030_PCIPMI_1995" and add the new scenario. Call the model “DHEM_v41_2030_PCIPMI_1995_unlmtd_pipeline”
author: Dante
default_llm_context: Perform the specified operation based on the user's input and the Terajoule Model specifications.

tasks.description: Retrieve the datafile attribute for the Gas Pipeline Capacity data file for the PCIPMI infrastructure level using the crud pipeline.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request: 'Modify the DHEM model...' select the most appropriate attribute from the list.

function_args.user_input: set all values that aren't 0 to 999 and copy the H2\Gas file

tasks.description: Create a variation of the Gas Pipeline Capacity data file by setting all values that aren't 0 to 999 and copying the H2\Gas file.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request: 'Modify the DHEM model...' select the most appropriate file from the list.

tasks.description: Create a new datafile object in the Datafile class using the Gas Pipeline category named for PCIPMI capacities Unlimited.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request: 'Modify the DHEM model...' select the most appropriate object from the list.

tasks.description: Add the filename property to the newly created datafile object with the name of the datafile just created.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request: 'Modify the DHEM model...' select the most appropriate property from the list.

tasks.description: Add a new scenario named unlimited_pci_pmi_pipeline_capacities.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request: 'Modify the DHEM model...' select the most appropriate object from the list.

tasks.description: Add a max flow property to each object in the H2 inteconnection and H2 Internal bottleneck categories in the Gas Pipeline class linking the datafile and scenario created in the previous steps.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request: 'Modify the DHEM model...' select the most appropriate property from the list.

tasks.description: Clone the model 'DHEM_v41_2030_PCIPMI_1995' and add the new scenario, then rename the cloned model to 'DHEM_v41_2030_PCIPMI_1995_unlmtd_pipeline'.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request: 'Modify the DHEM model...' select the model from the list.
